subject: English
goals: Understand the fundamental techniques of reading comprehension and identify key themes, main ideas, and supporting details in a text.
milestones: Finish the initial exercises that introduce identifying main ideas and supporting details; understand how these elements build the text's meaning.

timetable.session: Two 1-hour study sessions on Monday and Thursday

learning_tasks.task: Read an introductory article on comprehension strategies.
Watch a short educational video on identifying main ideas and supporting details.

practice_tasks.task: Complete a worksheet that contains short paragraphs to practice identifying the main idea.
Engage in a critical reading exercise by summarizing a paragraph and noting key points.

resources: 1. 'Reading Comprehension Strategies' by Jennifer Serravallo. 2. Online platform such as Khan Academy for videos on comprehension. 3. Worksheets available from education.com.
